org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface PVField

All Superinterfaces:
Requester, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
PVArray, PVBoolean, PVBooleanArray, PVByte, PVByteArray, PVDouble, PVDoubleArray, PVFloat, PVFloatArray, PVInt, PVIntArray, PVLong, PVLongArray, PVRecord, PVScalar, PVShort, PVShortArray, PVString, PVStringArray, PVStructure
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPVArray, AbstractPVField, AbstractPVScalar, AbstractSharePVArray, AbstractSharePVScalar, BasePVBoolean, BasePVBooleanArray, BasePVByte, BasePVByteArray, BasePVDouble, BasePVDoubleArray, BasePVFloat, BasePVFloatArray, BasePVInt, BasePVIntArray, BasePVLong, BasePVLongArray, BasePVRecord, BasePVShort, BasePVShortArray, BasePVString, BasePVStringArray, BasePVStructure
public interface PVField
extends Requester, Serializable

PVField is the base class for each PVData field. Each PVType has an interface that extends PVField.

Author:
mrk

Method Detail

getFieldOffset

int getFieldOffset()
Get offset of the PVField field within top level structure. Every field within the PVStructure has a unique offset. The top level structure has an offset of 0. The first field within the structure has offset equal to 1. The other offsets are determined by recursively traversing each structure of the tree.

Returns:
The offset.

getNextFieldOffset

int getNextFieldOffset()
Get the next offset. If the field is a scalar or array field then this is just offset + 1. If the field is a structure it is the offset of the next field after this structure. Thus (nextOffset - offset) is always equal to the number of fields within the field.

Returns:
The offset.

getNumberFields

int getNumberFields()
Get the total number of fields in this field. This is equal to nextFieldOffset - fieldOffset.

Returns:
The number of fields.

getPVAuxInfo

PVAuxInfo getPVAuxInfo()
Get the PVAuxInfo interface for the PVField.

Returns:
The PVAuxInfo interface.

isImmutable

boolean isImmutable()
Is the field immutable, i.e. does it not allow changes.

Returns:
(false,true) if it (is not, is) immutable.

setImmutable

void setImmutable()
Set the field to be immutable, i. e. it can no longer be modified. This is permanent, i.e. once done the field can onot be made mutable.

getFullFieldName

java.lang.String getFullFieldName()
Get the fullFieldName, i.e. the complete hierarchy.

Returns:
The name.

getFullName

java.lang.String getFullName()
Get the full name, which is the recordName plus the fullFieldName

Returns:
The name.

getField

Field getField()
Get the Field that describes the field.

Returns:
Field, which is the reflection interface.

getParent

PVStructure getParent()
Get the parent of this field.

Returns:
The parent interface or null if this is PVRecord

Get the record.

Returns:
The record interface.

Parameters:

addListener

boolean addListener(PVListener pvListener)
Add a listener to this field.

Parameters:
pvListener - The pvListener to add to list for postPut notification.
Returns:
(false,true) if the pvListener (was not,was) added. If the listener was already in the list false is returned.

removeListener

void removeListener(PVListener pvListener)
remove a pvListener.

Parameters:
pvListener - The listener to remove.

postPut

void postPut()
post that data has been modified. This must be called by the code that implements put.
